p: Table 2 showed the composition of alcoholic extracts, chemically characterized for the first time in this research. The mass fragmentations of molecules were in according to previous literature [ 23, 24]. The methanolic and hydro-alcoholic extracts with a yield of 5.3 ± 0.2% and 19.2 ± 0.2%, respectively, showed a similar fingerprinting where rosmarinic acid was the main compound, followed by rutin, caftaric and chlorogenic acids as minor components.
